DOC.brief_summary: The degree of TH1-skewing by mycobacteria is controlles by NRAMP1 gene polymorphisms and related to the degree of inhibition of TH2-mediated disease.
DOC.brief_title: Asthma, a Disease Due to a Lack of Bacterial Infections in Childhood.
DOC.detailed_description: A randomised single blinded intervention study in high-risk newborns vaccinated at the age of 6 weeks with BCG or placebo. Inclusion: high-risk was defined as either a mother or a father and a sibling with present or past atopic disease. Exclusion: maternal infection in the last week of pregnancy, the use of immunomodulatory drugs or antibiotics during pregnancy (mother), the use of antibiotics directly post-partum (newborn)
DOC.criteria: highrisk was defined as either a mother or a father plus a sibling with present or past atopic disease. maternal infection in the last week of pregnancy, the use of immunomodulatory drugs or antibiotics during pregnancy (mother) or directly post partum (newborn)
